subject: Baseball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Wilson Ramos, who had not executed a sacrifice bunt in more than three years, helped the Nationals beat the Giants and their ace, Madison Bumgarner, who threw away the bunt with disastrous results.
snippet: Wilson Ramos, who had not executed a sacrifice bunt in more than three years, helped the Nationals beat the Giants and their ace, Madison Bumgarner, who threw away the bunt with disastrous results.
